name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-enhanced-button
title: Enhanced Button
shortDescription: Extends the functionality of the native button web part.
longDescription: The Enhanced Button Web Part is a custom SharePoint web part that extends the functionality of the native button web part. It provides additional configuration options to create more customizable and flexible buttons within your SharePoint pages.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
